title: A very pleasaunt [and] fruitful diologe called the Epicure, made by that famous clerke Erasmus of Roterodame, newly translated. 1545
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publicationStmtDate: the. XXIX. daie of Iuly, the yere of our Lorde. M.D.XLV. [1545]]
publicationStmtPublisher: VVithin the precinct of the late dissolued house of the gray Friers, by Richarde Grafton, printer too the princes grace,
